line_1: Ask but for ten and you'll have the denial.
line_2: But I believe when it comes the tryal,

line_1: HOWE'ER she gave no flat Denial,
line_2: And was resolv'd upon a Tryal,

line_1: Had I not lov'd, you had found a denial
line_2: My tender Heart, alas, was but too real;

line_1: Full merveillous, I wote, were swilk Denyal.
line_2: That, by St Kit, had wrought much sorer Tryal:

line_1: "What is to recompence the harsh denyal,
Have met with proofs beyond denial;
line_2: These crimes successive, on your trial,

line_1: He must consent, there's no denial,
line_2: WHAT mortal Man could stand the Tryal!
